Package org.onyxfx.graphics.controls

Class OFxButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase
javafx.scene.control.Button
org.onyxfx.graphics.controls.OFxButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class OFxButton extends javafx.scene.control.Button
A custom JavaFX Button component that supports extended styling features such as hover, pressed, focused, and normal background colors. This button also supports configurable corner radius and an optional icon.

CSS properties:

  • -ofx-normal-color
  • -ofx-hover-color
  • -ofx-pressed-color
  • -ofx-focused-color

This control is designed to be used as part of the onyxfx library.
